name: Shark Fish Attack Hungry Jaws
description:
One of the Most addictive Shark Game on AppStore!

Play as a shark and you must do what you love! Swim around the ocean and fill your appetite by killing everything you can find.But Avoid hitting other big sharks and beware of underwater Warships.Remember you have got a super defense power to throw some kind of poison which can destroy things as big as Under Water Warships.Start your ultimate Shark Attack to upset them as you watch out for hazards that can harm you. Have fun!

Download Shark Attack Hungry Jaws!!

Hurry up!!!
